name: Laserwave
description:
Grab your mouse...

Turn up the volume...

Let the beats flow through you!

________________________________________________________

Laserwave is a synthwave bullet-hell-like rhythmic shooter where your actions are defined by the music!

_______________________________________________________

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 in 48 hours.

_______________________________________________________

Known bugs:

- In very rare cases the player character can leave the screen. If that happens, press 'R' to restart the level.
